name.es: Libro de Monumentos de la Ciudad
name.fr: Livre des Monuments de la Ville

description.en: Interactive book that brings famous city landmarks to life with 3D projections and animations
description.zh: 互动书籍，通过3D投影和动画将著名城市地标栩栩如生地呈现
description.ja: 3Dプロジェクションとアニメーションで有名な都市のランドマークを生き生きと表現するインタラクティブな本
description.ko: 3D 프로젝션과 애니메이션으로 유명한 도시 랜드마크를 생생하게 구현하는 인터랙티브 책
description.es: Libro interactivo que da vida a monumentos famosos de la ciudad con proyecciones 3D y animaciones
description.de: Interaktives Buch, das berühmte Stadtsehenswürdigkeiten mit 3D-Projektionen und Animationen zum Leben erweckt
description.fr: Livre interactif qui donne vie aux monuments célèbres de la ville avec des projections 3D et des animations
description.ar: كتاب تفاعلي يحيي معالم المدينة الشهيرة بالإسقاطات ثلاثية الأبعاد والرسوم المتحركة

visual_core.description: A book page turns, revealing {opening_sketch} that grows into {landmarks_description} contained entirely within the pages
visual_core.camera: macro page close-up → orbit across rising landmarks → wide top-down shot of city inside book
visual_core.environment: dark library table, the book as a glowing {city_atmosphere} diorama

elements: tiny details bringing the city to life

timeline.camera: macro glide across the page sketch
orbit close-up across miniature landmarks rising
top-down cinematic shot, showing the entire cityscape constrained by the book's edges

timeline.action: As the miniature city glows, the words '{city_name}' slowly materialize in elegant letters, floating magically above the book like a golden title.
timeline.camera: gentle zoom focusing on the glowing city name above the diorama
timeline.audio: mystical chime with city ambience fading

metadata.opening_sketch: a simple Parisian skyline sketch in elegant ink lines
metadata.landmarks_description: the iconic Eiffel Tower rising majestically, Arc de Triomphe forming at the book's edge
metadata.lighting_style: golden warm evening lights, romantic Parisian glow
metadata.city_elements: tiny cafes with glowing windows, street lamps, Seine river flowing between pages, miniature boulevards
metadata.ambient_sounds: soft Parisian cafe ambience echoing softly
metadata.music_style: romantic French accordion with orchestral backing
metadata.opening_action: Book page turns naturally, revealing an elegant Parisian skyline sketch with Eiffel Tower outline
metadata.transformation_action: Sketch lines glow golden and rise into the iconic Eiffel Tower and Parisian rooftops, all contained within the open book
metadata.transformation_audio: romantic melody building + gentle construction sounds
metadata.finale_action: Wide reveal: a fully-formed miniature Paris glows inside the book, with the Eiffel Tower as centerpiece and tiny lights in cafe windows
metadata.finale_audio: full French orchestra + soft city ambience
metadata.final_effect: Eiffel Tower's lights pulse and create glowing text across the book's pages
metadata.text_style: elegant French script glowing in golden light

metadata.opening_sketch: a bold Manhattan skyline sketch with strong ink strokes
metadata.landmarks_description: the Statue of Liberty emerging proudly, Empire State Building towering above
metadata.lighting_style: bright white lights, Times Square neon glow
metadata.city_elements: yellow taxi cabs moving, steam rising from manholes, Brooklyn Bridge spanning, neon billboards
metadata.ambient_sounds: contained NYC traffic rumble echoing softly
metadata.music_style: urban jazz with brass section and city rhythm
metadata.opening_action: Book page turns with energy, revealing a dynamic Manhattan skyline sketch with geometric buildings
metadata.transformation_action: Sketch lines glow white and rise into towering skyscrapers, Statue of Liberty emerging from one corner, all within the book
metadata.finale_action: Wide reveal: a complete miniature Manhattan glows inside the book, with yellow taxis moving and neon signs flickering
metadata.final_effect: Empire State Building's peak lights pulse and form glowing text
metadata.text_style: bold metropolitan font glowing in white neon

metadata.opening_sketch: a delicate Tokyo skyline sketch with cherry blossom motifs
metadata.landmarks_description: Tokyo Tower rising in red and white, Shibuya crossing forming with tiny pedestrians
metadata.lighting_style: vibrant neon signs mixed with soft pink sakura glow
metadata.city_elements: bullet trains gliding, cherry blossoms floating, neon kanji signs, tiny pedestrians crossing
metadata.music_style: modern J-pop with electronic beats and traditional instruments
metadata.opening_action: Book page turns gracefully, revealing a Tokyo skyline sketch decorated with cherry blossom petals
metadata.transformation_action: Sketch lines glow in neon colors and rise into Tokyo Tower and modern buildings, sakura petals floating upward, all within the book
metadata.finale_action: Wide reveal: a vibrant miniature Tokyo glows inside the book, with neon signs, crossing pedestrians, and floating cherry blossoms
metadata.finale_audio: full J-pop arrangement + city tech ambience
metadata.final_effect: Tokyo Tower's lights pulse in rainbow colors forming holographic text
metadata.text_style: futuristic Japanese characters glowing in neon colors

metadata.opening_sketch: a classic London skyline sketch with Victorian details

metadata.lighting_style: foggy street lamps, Victorian amber glow through mist
metadata.city_elements: red double-decker buses moving, black cabs, Thames river flowing, telephone boxes, fog swirling
metadata.ambient_sounds: contained London fog atmosphere with distant chimes
metadata.music_style: classical British orchestra with church bells
metadata.opening_action: Book page turns with dignity, revealing a stately London skyline sketch with Big Ben prominence
metadata.opening_audio: distant Big Ben chimes + fog ambience
metadata.transformation_action: Sketch lines glow amber and rise into Big Ben and Tower Bridge, fog swirling around Victorian architecture, all within the book
metadata.transformation_audio: church bells building + Victorian construction sounds
metadata.finale_action: Wide reveal: a complete miniature London glows inside the book, with red buses crossing Tower Bridge and fog adding atmosphere
metadata.final_effect: Big Ben's clock face glows and projects time-based text formation
metadata.text_style: classic Victorian font glowing in warm amber
